mapper.insert: insert into shop_member_detail (id,user_id, total_consumption, invite_member_num, invite_merchat_num, invite_partners_num, sales_performance, province_id, city_id, area_id, address, status,want_buy_type,name,phone,join_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalConsumption,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inviteMemberNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inviteMerchatNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invitePartnersNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesPerformance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wantBuyType,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update shop_member_detail
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_consumption = #{totalConsumption,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invite_member_num = #{inviteMemberNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invite_merchat_num = #{inviteMerchatNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invite_partners_num = #{invitePartnersNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sales_performance = #{salesPerformance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
want_buy_type = #{wantBuyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
#{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from shop_member_detail where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1

select smd.sales_performance,smd.invite_partners_num,smd.invite_member_num,smd.name,smd.phone, smd.province_id,smd.city_id,smd.area_id,smd.address,smd.join_time,sm.user_id from shop_member_detail smd left join shop_member sm on smd.user_id = sm.user_id where sm.merchant_type = #{merchantType} and smd.status = 1 and sm.superior_member = #{userId} order by smd.join_time desc
